name: places/ChIJI_Hs_phZwokR1YoVC-ASClY
formattedAddress: 56 E 13th St A, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 56 E 13th St A, New York, NY 10003-4660, USA

originalText.text: I’m from NC and during my trip I wanted to get my eyebrows done. I usually get them threaded and I stumbled on this place and decided to give them a shot. The ladies were super friendly and the lady that did my eyebrows did exactly what I asked for - arching them and keeping the thickness. I did tinting and threading. No need to make an appointment because they accept walk-ins. Check them out!

originalText.text:
I was recommend this spot by a friend, and can confirm it’s better than a lot of studios in the area (Brow Studio, Unique threading, etc.).  Mandeep is my go-to: she’s attentive and gets it right. Highly recommend Mandeep for eye brow threading.
I book my appointment via classpass credits (4 credits), and tip on Venmo or cash.

originalText.text: Every time I get my eyebrows done here I get so many complements as they are always perfect no matter who does them.  I also recently started doing lazer and after only three appointments I am already seeing so much improvement.

text.text: Every time I get my eyebrows done here I get so many complements as they are always perfect no matter who does them.  I also recently started doing lazer and after only three appointments I am already seeing so much improvement.

originalText.text: Everyone at brows zone is super nice and welcoming. They make you feel comfortable with everything. I started getting my laser here and the technicians clearly know what they’re doing. The laser seriously works and i haven’t waxed since especially because laser hurts WAY less than waxing. I owe it to my laser technician. Thanks brows zone for taking care of me!

text.text: Everyone at brows zone is super nice and welcoming. They make you feel comfortable with everything. I started getting my laser here and the technicians clearly know what they’re doing. The laser seriously works and i haven’t waxed since especially because laser hurts WAY less than waxing. I owe it to my laser technician. Thanks brows zone for taking care of me!

originalText.text:
I had the pleasure of receiving a facial from Nisha, whom I met at the brows zone in Union Square. Right from the start, Nisha attentively listened to my concerns about my sensitive skin and the need for a soothing post-extraction experience. She took the time to understand what bothered me on my face and expertly recommended a customized treatment. Nisha utilizes premium products from the renowned French brand Sothys, which not only smell delightful but also deliver exceptional results.

During the facial, Nisha's massage technique transported me to another realm. Her hands possess a magical touch that induces total relaxation, often leading me to a blissful micro nap. I entrusted Nisha with a special treatment one day before my wedding, and she went above and beyond to ensure that I felt absolutely amazing on my special day.

It is no exaggeration to say that Nisha provides one of the finest facials you can experience for just $85. Her exceptional skills, combined with the high-quality products she uses, result in an extraordinary pampering session. Keep in mind that Nisha has plans for future travels, so be sure to secure your monthly facial appointments with her in advance.
